mapper.insert: insert into info (info_id, member_email, class_id) values (lpad(to_char(info_seq.nextval), 6, '0'), #{member_email}, #{class_id})
insert into class(class_id, class_name, class_code, class_maker) values ('CLS'||lpad(to_char(class_seq.nextval), 6, '0'), #{class_name}, #{class_code}, #{member_email})

mapper.select: select count(*) from class where class_code = #{class_code}
